content.text: Hey there! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great! I just spent my birthday alone, but I had a lot of fun relaxing at home.
Happy belated birthday! That sounds like a really relaxing way to spend your birthday.
Thanks! I'm glad I decided to do it.
Before I was a mom in telecommunications, I was a sniper in the army. Do you have any interesting stories from your time in the army?

I do! My favorite story is about the time I was on a mission to take out a target. We were on a rooftop, and I was the only one who could see the target. I took the shot, and it was a direct hit. The target was killed, and we were able to complete our mission successfully.
That's an amazing story! I'm so glad you were able to complete your mission successfully.
Thanks! It was a close call, but we made it out alive.
I'm sure it was! I'm glad you're safe.
I love teaching and travelling. I'm also a big fan of Comic Con, but I don't think it's really your thing.
Haha, that's right! I'm not really into Comic Con. I'm more of a music person. I love to listen to music while I'm working on my photography projects.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not really a photographer, but I love listening to music too
